snippet: Pittsburgh quarterback Ben Roethlisberger said he aggravated his sprained left ankle against Cleveland last weekend but expected to play at Denver on Sunday.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Pittsburgh Steelers quarterback Ben Roethlisberger says he aggravated his sprained left ankle against Cleveland Browns but expects to play against Denver Broncos in first-round playoff game; other NFL developments noted.
lead_paragraph: Pittsburgh quarterback Ben Roethlisberger said he aggravated his sprained left ankle against Cleveland last weekend but expected to play at Denver on Sunday.

headline.seo: Roethlisberger Limping But Says He Will Play
headline.main: Roethlisberger Limping but Says He Will Play
